description: Detects the execution of "logman" utility in order to disable or delete Windows trace sessions
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Installer tools that disable services, e.g. before log collection agent installation
name: Suspicious Windows Trace ETW Session Tamper Via Logman.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\logman.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Logman.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*stop\ *" OR "*delete\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*Circular\ Kernel\ Context\ Logger*" OR "*EventLog\-*" OR "*SYSMON\ TRACE*" OR "*SysmonDnsEtwSession*"))
